data.name: Sector Assault
data.detailed_description:
Sector Assault is a revolution of the classic Asteroids formula. In this inspired twist, your mission is to defeat an enemy armada with weapons and tactics as extensive as your own. Your battle across the sector will include...

15 Powerful Loadout Options


Wield any combination of four weapons and equipment. Fire swarms of missiles, get up close and personal with the Scattershot, or zap enemies from behind cover with Chain Lightning. Equipment provides even more offense while offering utility and defense. Teleport, stun high-priority targets, or project an energy field that increases ramming damage. Melee combat - in a space shooter!

16 Enemy Types


The opposing fleet includes everything from phased cruise missiles to raiders that teleport in and out of combat. Evade mobile mines and sweeping laser beams as you exchange fire with heavily armed and armored juggernauts. Even the rank-and-file boast special attacks, giving them the power to fill your screen with energy bolts.

30 Waves of Finely Crafted Mayhem


Enemies are capable of warping in formation or surrounding you without warning. Further testing your reflexes are the endless combinations that complement each other or overwhelm with brute force. Even in the most chaotic moments, spawn rates are finely-tuned for a smooth and satisfying pace.

The Stunning Beauty of Deep Space


Sector Assault's backgrounds have been selected from thousands of randomly generated combinations. Each one is streaked with gorgeous nebulas and enhanced by parallaxing for added depth. Rounding out the game's atmosphere are music and sound effects handpicked just as carefully.

Choose your loadouts wisely, adapt faster than your enemy, and achieve victory in your mission to secure the sector!

data.short_description: In this arcade space shooter, combine weapons and equipment to create the perfect loadouts. Battle an enemy fleet as diverse as your own arsenal, dodging cruise missiles, phasing through lasers, and ramming targets as you fight to reclaim the sector!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
